name: Explosion City
description:
Welcome to Explosion City! YOU have been chosen to spend some time here, but be careful! In this city bombs are falling from the sky, make sure to avoid them and the holes they leave to survive. You will be spending your day here with some of your friends, friends that might become enemies...

/

Play with your friends! 

KEYBOARD: 2 PLAYERS

XBOX ONE/XBOX 360 CONTROLLERS: 2-4 PLAYERS

/

Blop Sound Effect:

http://soundbible.com/2067-Blop.html
